description: Create a program that asks the user to enter a whole number and calculates the square root of the number. Round the answer down to the nearest whole number using the floor command and print it to the screen.
correct-program:
import math
number = int(input("Enter a whole number: ")) sqrt_value = math.sqrt(number) rounded_down_sqrt = math.floor(sqrt_value)
print(f"The square root of {number} rounded down is {rounded_down_sqrt}.")
